Text: RE Napoleonville land Cc NonPrivilegedpst Mary the last and only time I saw these was in a joint meeting with AnnElizabeth and Robert Rose Robert actually had these documents executed and available However the point was raised that one set of the documents was never filed with the courthouse If you can get a copy from Robert Rose you should Also if anyone in legal knows how to check whether they were filed we should do that as well Cheers Pat Original Message From Ogden Mary Sent Monday July PM To Johnson Patrick Cc Nemec Gerald Subject Napoleonville land Dear Patrick We are trying to obtain copies of the document whereby Enron Storage Company conveyed the Napoleonville land assets to LRCI Inc They were probably part of the Bridgeline closing documents Do you have any documents that support this conveyance Please advise Thanks Mary x

FW LRCI Inc ANonPrivilegedpst Gerald and Roger please see attached The one change that jumps out at me is the period of nonusage from days to two years Isnt there an industry standard we should hold to I dont know if its one or two years Otherwise I dont have any issues with their changes but will yield to your judgement Thanks Also we need to draft an invoice for the RW As calculated by Roger it is Rods At rod they owe us Roger is verifying the rod Original Message From Heidi E Broussard mailto Sent Tuesday August PM To Johnson Patrick Subject LRCI Inc A Mr Johnson Attached is the revised RW for your review and approval What does GNOEC stand for page para Thanks Heidi E Broussard

RE LRCI Agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst My latest recollection is that the Sorrento reps were going to provide the plat Heidi Broussard indicated this We should get the original exhibits before we execute so GeraldRoger can review them and include them in the package Original Message From Westbrook Roger Sent Tuesday September AM To Johnson Patrick Israni Rakhi Cc Nemec Gerald Subject RE LRCI Agreement The note below asks about plats I do have a faxed copy of a plat but have not seen originals Are those still needed What is the status of the Bridgeline easement I do have some plats they sent over to me Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept voice fax File Westbrook Rogervcf Original Message From Johnson Patrick Sent Monday September PM To Israni Rakhi Westbrook Roger Subject FW LRCI Agreement Latest version of Sorrento ROW Rakhi please follow up and ensure that we receive payment upon execution of these documents It should be done by wire Annette Thompson or Karen Gruesen should be able to give you the appropriate wiring instructions The total cost agreed to was You should probably follow up with Gerald to ensure that the bill was prepared and sent Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday September PM To Kyle Webster ENRON Cc Johnson Patrick Subject RE LRCI Agreement Kyle Attached is the agreement with the two changes I discussed on my voice mail message Please review Do we have a property description and a plat File LRCI IncAgreement doc

FW FW Enron Tract ANonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Johnson Patrick Sent Friday June PM To Van Hooser Steve Subject FW FW Enron Tract A Steve this was forwarded to me by Robert Rose Should we change the name to LRCI Inc and go with it Well still need a legal description of the RW itself Pat x Original Message From Rose Robert Sent Wednesday May PM To Johnson Patrick Subject Re FW Enron Tract A Patrick While reviewing the proposed easement I found myself making many changes to the easement It then occurred to me that Ann Elizabeth has already prepared a standard easement for situation where another company wishes to construct a new pipeline across HPL owned property Perhaps you can use this standard easement agreement attached hereto for the situation in Assumption Parish Let me know your thoughts on this agreement Its terms and conditions are certainly more favorable to Enrons interests r From Patrick nronXgate on AM To Robert NRON cc Subject FW Enron Tract A Robert can you please review the attached file and provide comments Thank you Original Message From Heidi E Broussard ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESHeidiEEBroussardCheidihoeatelEnetE NRONcom Sent Tuesday May PM To Johnson Patrick Cc Bernie Watson Subject Re Enron Tract A Per your request attached is a preliminary ROW for your review designated as Tract in Section SE Assumption Parish Louisiana Thanks Heidi Original Message From Johnson Patrick To Heidi E Broussard Sent Monday May PM Subject RE Enron Tract You may submit your ROW request to me Pat Patrick Johnson Smith EB Houston TX o f c Original Message From Heidi E Broussard ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESHeidiEEBroussardCheidihoeatel EnetE NRONcom Sent Sunday May PM To Johnson Patrick Cc Bernie Watson Subject Re Enron Tract Thanks so much for that information Could you email me the name of the contact I need to speak with to furthur pursue acquiring this RW Thanks Heidi Original Message From Johnson Patrick To Heidi E Broussard Sent Friday May AM Subject RE Enron Tract I received your faxes LRCI a whollyowned subsidiary of Enron owns the tract A in the NorthEast corner of Township in Assumption Parish I cannot comment on the North Elec Tracts ownership except to confirm that Enron has no current ownership in that tract Depending on your need for the information there are various individuals within Enron who I would direct you to speak with Regards Original Message From Heidi E Broussard ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESHeidiEEBroussardCheidihoeatel EnetE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Johnson Patrick Cc Bernie Watson Subject Fw Enron Tract Mr Johnson Per my conversation with Robert Rose earlier today he has reffered me to youI would like your assistance in figuring out acreage owned by Enron Storage Company After further reviewing title I have discovered that Enron May still own Tract A as described on a plat prepared by Hydro Consultants inc dated April Dwg No C which plat I will fax to your office I will also fax a plat of the proposed pipeline affecting the NORTH ELEC TRACT AND TRACT A PS The NORTH ELEC TRACT as shown on the platappears to be owned now by El Paso Thanking you in advance for your assistance Heidi E Broussard LRCI A heididoc

Crawfish Mowing LetterNonPrivilegedpst As discussed in my voice mail could you please review the Property Description for adequacy keeping in mind the signer is a downhome goodol boy I will yield to your judgement Thanks Regards Patrick Johnson Smith EB Houston TX o f c
